original_title: ほんとにあった！怖い心霊スポット
overview: A horror documentary released by the staff of the "Horror Urban Legend that really happened" series. We will introduce 4 spots in total, including "Tacchan Pond" and "Old Fukiage Tunnel", which we picked up and field surveyed terrifying haunted spots whose existence is talked about on the Internet and in books.
title: It Really Happened! Scary Psychic Spot
